meanings.sent1: The mashed potatoes were the lumpiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The ground was lumpy, but the mattress was even.
meanings.sent3: The lumpiest pillow in the house always made guests laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt at baking a cake turned out to be the lumpiest disaster.
meanings.sent5: The lumpiest road in town made driving a bumpy adventure.

meanings.definition: Characterized by unevenness in texture or form
meanings.sent1: The lumpiest sweater she owned was surprisingly cozy.
meanings.sent2: The path through the forest was the lumpiest route to take.
meanings.sent3: His drawing of a tree ended up looking like the lumpiest cloud.
meanings.sent4: The lumpiest terrain proved challenging for the hikers.
meanings.sent5: The lumpiest cake she baked had a unique, homemade charm.
